Articles.Content:
This is a quick fork of \_Augustus\_' (wow, that grammar was *intense*) [Bacon Labs](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121217-1-0-2-Bacon-Labs-Stockalike-Ariane-More-Version-1-0-Official-Release!-13-May?p=1937547#post1937547) mod that simply removes all mention of the word "Bacon" for the vegetarians among us. I will try to keep it updated as new content is added, but I make no guarantees.

You can grab it from Curse\* or [Kerbalstuff](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/889/Meatless%20Industries).

No pictures, go to his thread for well-staged screenshots ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

All credit, stuff, etc, to the original creators of the content.

[License](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)

Apparently changelogs are a thing. You're not getting one, though ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

\*currently awaiting approval, I will post a link as soon as it is up.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-05T01:18:22Z" title="06/05/2015 01:18  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 5, 2015</time> by DuoDex**
LOL, I guess Parts\ESV\model000.png needs to be edited too :-D

> 
> LOL, I guess Parts\ESV\model000.png needs to be edited too :-D

Clearly an unacceptable mistake, I have rectified it with GIMP ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I prefer the name "Tofu Technologies" ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Must I remind everyone what happened to poor little tofu boy? 

He had a severe lack of iron, and as a result was so weak he couldn't even manage to jump high enough to clear the first stage....

Eeh. What of us who are offended by the lack of bacon? As we speak I have four kinds of bacon in my fridge, brown sugar, pepper, Italian and maple syrup. I can see how some people might eat less bacon than others, but no bacon? At all?
Aww, I thought it was going to be unmanned probe parts.
Excellent mod. A++ would download again!

> 
> Excellent mod. A++ would download again!

I'm sorry, but:

![giphy.gif](http://media.giphy.com/media/VBUIvFMG4eEOQ/giphy.gif)

Too funny!

> 
> I'm sorry, but:
> [http://media.giphy.com/media/VBUIvFMG4eEOQ/giphy.gif](http://media.giphy.com/media/VBUIvFMG4eEOQ/giphy.gif)
> 
> Too funny!

My thoughts exactly.

I want to download this mod, but can you assure me that you weren't wearing leather or fur when you made it? Or that no eggs or cheese were eaten? 

Plus I don't want you to hurt any bugs that are discovered, bugs have feelings too.

> 
> I want to download this mod, but can you assure me that you weren't wearing leather or fur when you made it? Or that no eggs or cheese were eaten? 
> Plus I don't want you to hurt any bugs that are discovered, bugs have feelings too.

Sure bugs have feelings too

![latest?cb=20141025075646](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/men-in-black/images/a/a9/Ed.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141025075646)

But I am for squashing bugs anyway. I should probably not download this add-on, I'm not qualified to use it.

But what will this crusade of mod enforced vegetarianism mean for our Salami powered rocketry program
